subject: Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: The semifinals — Clemson versus Oklahoma in the Orange Bowl and Alabama versus Michigan State in the Cotton Bowl — are compelling, but a focus on crowning an undisputed champion has a downside.
snippet: The semifinals — Clemson versus Oklahoma in the Orange Bowl and Alabama versus Michigan State in the Cotton Bowl — are compelling, but a focus on crowning an undisputed champion has a downside.
